item.title: 美国参议院将于本周就禁止加州 2035 年电动车计划的法案进行表决
item.description: 美国参议院多数党领袖约翰-图恩（John Thune）周二表示，美国参议院计划在本周进行投票，禁止加利福尼亚州到 2035 年停止销售纯汽油车的里程碑式计划，该计划已被其他 11 个州采纳。【原文：The U.S. Senate plans to vote this week to bar California's landmark plan to end the sale of gasoline-only vehicles by 2035 that has been adopted by 11 other states, Majority Leader John Thune said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 参议员就《60 分钟》试图与特朗普和解一事质询派拉蒙公司的雷德斯通
item.description: 周一，一群参议员致信派拉蒙全球董事长莎莉-雷德斯通，希望了解哥伦比亚广播公司新闻频道（CBS News）所有者为解决与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的诉讼所做的努力。【原文：A group of senators sent a letter to Paramount Global chair Shari Redstone on Monday, seeking information about the CBS News owner's efforts to settle a lawsuit with U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 天气将影响俄罗斯最大谷物产区的收成
item.description: 当地谷物游说团体负责人在宣布农业紧急状态后表示，未来几个月的高温和缺雨天气预计将导致俄罗斯最大的谷物产区罗斯托夫的收成减少。【原文：High temperatures and a lack of rain over the coming months are expected to deplete the harvest in Russia's largest grain region Rostov, the head of the local grain lobby group said after a farming emergency was declared.】

item.title: 澳大利亚亿万富翁的公司增持股份后，维多利亚的秘密采取 "毒丸 "措施
item.description: 在澳大利亚亿万富翁布雷特-布伦迪（Brett Blundy）的投资公司增持这家内衣制造商的股份后，维多利亚的秘密（Victoria's Secret）周二通过了一项股东权利计划。【原文：Victoria's Secret adopted a shareholder rights plan on Tuesday, after Australian billionaire Brett Blundy's investment firm increased its stake in the lingerie maker.】

item.title: 独家报道哈萨克斯坦 5 月石油产量增长 2%，与欧佩克（OPEC+）分庭抗礼
item.description: 一位业内人士周二表示，哈萨克斯坦 5 月份的石油产量增长了 2%，这一增长无视欧佩克+组织（OPEC+）要求中亚国家减产的压力。【原文：Kazakhstan's oil production has risen by 2% in May, an industry source said on Tuesday, an increase that defies pressure from OPEC+ on the Central Asian country to reduce its output.】

item.title: 马斯克表示 5 年后仍将担任特斯拉首席执行官
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周二在卡塔尔的一个经济论坛上表示，他仍致力于在五年内担任特斯拉公司首席执行官。【原文：Elon Musk said on Tuesday at an economic forum in Qatar that he was still committed to being Tesla CEO in five years' time.】

item.title: 员工奖励公司 Awardco 在最新一轮融资后估值达 10 亿美元
item.description: 员工奖励平台 Awardco 周二表示，该公司在由投资公司 Sixth Street Growth 和 Spectrum Equity 领投的一轮融资中筹集了 1.65 亿美元，使其估值超过 10 亿美元。【原文：Employee-rewards platform Awardco said on Tuesday it has raised $165 million in a funding round led by investment firms Sixth Street Growth and Spectrum Equity, pushing its valuation to more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 面临搜索挑战，谷歌将在 I/O 大会上发布人工智能升级版
item.description: 本周二，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司（Google）将召开年度开发者大会，发布一系列公告，展示其在人工智能领域的巨额投资，同时试图抵御外界对其业务未来的担忧。【原文：Alphabet's Google kicks off its annual developer conference on Tuesday with a flurry of announcements showcasing its huge investment in artificial intelligence, while seeking to fend off concerns over the future of its business.】

item.title: 雷诺首席执行官表示，雷诺仍愿意向竞争对手提供技术，以降低汽车成本
item.description: 法国汽车制造商雷诺公司首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca De Meo）周二表示，雷诺愿意向其他汽车制造商提供技术，帮助提高汽车的总产量。【原文：French automaker Renault is willing to supply technology to other carmakers to help increase the total output of vehicles with shared features that make them cheaper to manufacture, CEO Luca De Meo said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Levi Strauss 将以 3.11 亿美元向 Authentic Brands 出售 Dockers，专注于核心品牌
item.description: Levi Strauss 周二表示，将以 3.11 亿美元的价格把旗下的 Dockers 服装品牌出售给锐步和 Van Heusen 的所有者 Authentic Brands Group，以专注于其旗舰品牌 Levi's 和 Beyond Yoga 运动服装系列。【原文：Levi Strauss on Tuesday said it will sell its Dockers apparel brand to Reebok and Van Heusen owner Authentic Brands Group for $311 million to focus on its flagship Levi's brand and the Beyond Yoga activewear line.】

item.title: 加拿大 4 月份年度通胀率降至 1.7%，但核心指标上升
item.description: 加拿大统计局（Statistics Canada）周二称，由于联邦消费者碳税取消后整体能源价格骤降12.7%，加拿大4月份的年通胀率从3月份的2.3%降至1.7%。【原文：Canada's annual inflation rate in April fell to 1.7% from 2.3% in March as overall energy prices plunged 12.7% after the removal of a federal consumer carbon tax, Statistics Canada said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国石油并购从 2023 年的高点下滑，买家注重价值而非数量
item.description: 2025 年，美国油田区的交易放缓，预计今年余下时间交易活动将持续低迷，因为一些多产买家专注于从过去的收购中榨取价值，而另一些买家则因油价疲软和贸易不确定性而抑制收购欲望。【原文：Dealmaking in the U.S. oil patch has slowed to a crawl in 2025, with the activity expected to stay muted for the rest of the year, as some prolific buyers focus on squeezing out value from their past acquisitions, while others curb their appetite for takeovers due to weak oil prices and trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 消息人士称，随着市场趋于稳定，Blackstone 启动歌乐出售计划
item.description: 四位熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone 已启动对 Clarion Events 的出售，这是在几周的市场动荡阻碍交易后对收购需求的一次考验。【原文：Blackstone has kicked off the sale of Clarion Events, four people familiar with the matter said, in a test of demand for takeovers after weeks of market turmoil stymied dealmaking.】

item.title: 前戴尔-达勒姆公司首席执行官希望变革，称可能召开特别会议
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信，前 Dye & Durham 首席执行官 Matthew Proud 告诉这家加拿大法律软件制造商，除非董事会考虑他提出的变革建议，否则他准备召开一次特别股东大会。【原文：Former Dye & Durham Chief Executive Officer Matthew Proud told the Canadian legal software maker he is ready to call a special shareholder meeting unless the board considers changes he is proposing, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 德国在七国集团峰会前表示应尽快解决贸易争端
item.description: 德国财政部长拉尔斯-克林拜尔（Lars Klingbeil）周二在与七国集团其他国家的财政部长会晤前表示，应尽快解决目前与美国的贸易争端，以造福各方。【原文：Ongoing trade disputes with the United States should be resolved as quickly as possible for the benefit of all, German Finance Minister Lars Klingbeil said on Tuesday, ahead of meeting his counterparts from other Group of Seven countries.】

item.title: 巴西央行行长称稳定币引发巴西资本流动波动
item.description: 巴西央行副行长周二表示，美元支持的稳定币作为一种向国外转移资金的方式而大受欢迎，这增加了巴西资本流动的不稳定性。【原文：The surge in popularity of U.S. dollar-backed stablecoins as a way of transferring money abroad is increasing the volatility of Brazilian capital flows, Brazil's central bank deputy governor said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：南非将在特朗普会晤前与马斯克达成 "星链 "协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引三位熟悉相关讨论的人士的话报道，南非政府计划为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链（Starlink）互联网服务在该国的运营提供一个当地黑人所有权法律的变通办法。【原文：South Africa's government plans to offer a workaround of local Black ownership laws for Elon Musk's Starlink internet service to operate in the country, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing three people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 卡塔尔投资管理局（QIA）计划在未来十年将美国年投资额至少翻一番
item.description: 卡塔尔主权财富基金（QIA）首席执行官周二表示，该基金计划在未来十年内将美国的年投资额至少翻一番，此前该基金已承诺在未来十年内向美国经济投资 5000 亿美元。【原文：Qatar's sovereign wealth fund (QIA) is planning to at least double its annual U.S. investments in the next decade, its CEO said on Tuesday, after the fund has already pledged to invest $500 billion in the U.S. economy over the next 10 years.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长埃斯克里瓦认为美国贸易政策对全球金融业构成风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者何塞-路易斯-埃斯克里瓦（Jose Luis Escriva）周二警告说，美国关税引发的地缘政治和贸易紧张局势对全球金融体系的稳定和全球经济增长构成了风险。【原文：Geopolitical and trade tensions stemming from U.S. tariffs pose a risk to the stability of the global financial system and to global economic growth, European Central Bank policymaker Jose Luis Escriva warned on Tuesday.】

item.title: 与美国和欧盟达成协议，英国开始高风险平衡行动
item.description: 英国对贸易协议的追求使其成为驾驭特朗普新世界秩序的试验品。【原文：Britain's pursuit of trade deals has made it a test case for navigating Trump's new world order.】

item.title: WeRide 加入腾讯云，打造面向海外市场的智能驾驶服务
item.description: 中国自动驾驶初创公司 WeRide 周二表示，将与腾讯云合作，推动机器人出租车的大规模商业运营，并为海外市场打造智能驾驶解决方案。【原文：Chinese self-driving startup WeRide said on Tuesday that it will partner with Tencent Cloud to promote large-scale robotaxi commercial operations and build smart driving solutions for overseas markets.】

item.title: 早间竞标尴尬的七国集团
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 据《澳大利亚金融时报》报道，西太平洋银行将裁员 1,500 人，简化业务流程
item.description: 据《澳大利亚金融评论报》周二报道，西太平洋银行（Westpac Banking Corp）正计划裁员1500多人，以实现成本削减目标，并根据一项名为 "团结"（Unite）的计划简化业务。【原文：Westpac Banking Corp is planning to cut more than 1,500 jobs to meet cost reduction targets and simplify operations under a plan known as Unite, the Australian Financial Review reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会民主党人要求法官裁定特朗普非法解雇他们
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会（Federal Trade Commission）的两名民主党人于今年 3 月被唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统解雇，他们将于周二敦促华盛顿的一名联邦法官宣布此举非法，这是有关总统权力限制的最新一次摊牌。【原文：Two Democrats on the U.S. Federal Trade Commission who were fired by President Donald Trump in March will urge a federal judge in Washington to declare the move illegal on Tuesday, in the latest showdown over the limits of presidential power.】

item.title: 需求稳定，家得宝销售额超预期，维持预期
item.description: 本周二，家得宝第一季度销售额超出华尔街预期，原因是这家全球最大的家装零售商享受到了专业承包商和现有房主小规模维修工程的强劲需求。【原文：Home Depot beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter sales on Tuesday as the world's largest home improvement retailer enjoyed resilient demand from professional contractors and small-scale repair works by existing homeowners.】

item.title: 印尼打车司机举行抗议活动，要求提高薪酬
item.description: 周二，数百名出租车和外卖司机在印尼多个城市参加抗议活动，抗议低工资和反对印尼最大的科技公司GoTo与在美国上市的打车服务竞争对手Grab的合并计划。【原文：Hundreds of taxi and delivery drivers joined protests in several cities across Indonesia on Tuesday over low wages and to oppose a planned merger between the country's largest tech company GoTo and U.S.-listed ride-hailing rival Grab .】

item.title: 美国众议院共和党人期待特朗普弥补党派在税收法案上的分歧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将于周二前往国会山与国会共和党人会面，他们的目标是就一项全面的减税法案达成一致，而共和党人以微弱多数在减支范围上存在分歧。【原文：President Donald Trump is expected to head to Capitol Hill on Tuesday to meet with congressional Republicans as they aim to reach agreement on a sweeping tax-cut bill, with their narrow majority divided over the scope of spending cuts.】

item.title: 减肥公司努姆转向小剂量复方威戈维
item.description: 随着美国药品监管机构对大批量生产诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk）的Wegovy这种抢手药品的行为进行查禁，在线减肥公司Noom开始提供剂量较小的复方制剂。【原文：Online weight-loss company Noom has begun offering smaller doses of compounded versions of Novo Nordisk's Wegovy as the U.S. drugs regulator clamps down on mass production of copies of the in-demand medicine.】

item.title: 独家报道雷-库兹韦尔（Ray Kurzweil）的仿人机器人初创公司正在洽谈 1 亿美元投资事宜
item.description: 著名人工智能未来学家雷-库兹韦尔（Ray Kurzweil）联合创办的仿人机器人初创公司周二表示，风险投资公司 Gauntlet Ventures 将支持其 1 亿美元的 B 轮融资。【原文：A humanoid robotics startup co-founded by prominent artificial-intelligence futurist Ray Kurzweil said on Tuesday that venture capital firm Gauntlet Ventures will back its $100 million Series B funding round.】

item.title: 美联储官员发表评论前，美股期货走低
item.description: 周二，美国股指期货小幅走低，投资者全天等待美联储官员的评论，以判断央行在美国信用评级最新下调后的政策立场。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were marginally lower on Tuesday as investors awaited commentary from Federal Reserve officials through the day to gauge the central bank's policy stance after the latest downgrade of the United States' credit rating.】
